videooutput: Can be selected from NTSC and PAL
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure with motion detection and exposure compensation (-2.0 to +2.0 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
weight: Approx. 171 g (6.1 oz) (including battery and SD memory card)
focallength: 4.0-20.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28-140 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
metering: 256-segment matrix, center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x), spot (digital zoom 2x or more)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries (x2), USB Cable UC-E16, ViewNX 2 Installer CD, Reference Manual CD
continuousshooting: Single (default setting), Continuous (Up to 4 images at about 1.2 fps), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16
monitor: 7.5-cm (3-in.), approx. 230k-dot, TFT LCD with 5-level brightness adjustment
batterylife: Still pictures*: Approx. 220 shots when using alkaline batteries Approx. 680 shots when using lithium batteries Approx. 370 shots when using EN-MH2 batteries Movies: Approx. 55 min when using alkaline batteries (HD 720p) Approx. 3 h 45 min when using lithium batteries (HD 720p) Approx. 2 h 10 min when using EN-MH2 batteries (HD 720p)
media: Internal memory (approx. 20 MB), SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card
focusrangefromlens: [W]: Approx. 30 cm (1 ft) to infinity, [T]: Approx. 60 cm (2 ft) to infinity Macro mode: Approx. 3 cm (1.2 in.) (zoom position at the triangle mark) to infinity
powersources: Two LR6/L40 (AA-size) alkaline batteries Two FR6/L91 (AA-size) lithium batteries Two EN-MH2 rechargeable Ni-MH batteries (available separately) AC Adapter EH-65A (available separately)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 96.2 x 60.4 x 29.2 mm (3.8 x 2.4 x 1.2 in.) (excluding projections)
movie: HD 720p (default setting): 1280 x 720/approx. 30 fps, VGA: 640 x 480/approx. 30 fps, QVGA: 320 x 240/approx. 30 fps
construction: 6 elements in 5 groups (1 ED lens element)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
shootingmodes: Easy Auto, Scene (Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night portrait, Party/indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk/dawn, Night landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks show, Black and white copy, Backlighting, Panorama assist, Pet portrait), Smart Portrait, Auto
optionalaccessories: Rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2-B2 (set of two EN-MH2 batteries), Rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2-B4 (set of four EN-MH2 batteries), Battery Charger MH-72 (includes two rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2), Battery Charger MH-73 (includes four rechargeable Ni-MH batteries EN-MH2), AC Adapter EH-65A, Audio Video Cable EG-CP14
rangeapproxisosensitivityauto: [W]: 0.3 to 4.2 m (1 ft to 13 ft) [T]: 0.6 to 1.6 m (2 ft to 5 ft 2 in.)
imagesensor: 1/3-in. type CCD; approx. 10.44 million total pixels
